about_the_game:
Give more of your townsfolk voices with NPC Female Villagers Vol2! TK. Projects is back with another set of 12 character voices to help bring life to your towns and villages. Have cheerful girls yell hello as your heroes walk by, a sleepy young shopkeeper groan if you wake her up without buying anything, or an elderly woman gasp in fear when your heroes ask for advice about a magical book they stumbled upon in a dungeon.

With 10 different SEs for each character voice, you’re ready to add some more emotional reactions to your female NPCs as they wander their hometowns. This pack is ready to drop right into your favorite engine, so if you’ve been wanting to add some extra liveliness to your NPCs then check out NPC Female Villagers Vol2!

Features:

* 120 different phrases and sayings
* 10 SE per character
* ogg and m4a file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
